1.plot: Enjoy this deliciously refreshing smoothie and grab some moments of peace in this scorching heat.

3.plot: 'Strawberry Mojito' where the strawberry pairs perfectly with fresh mint leaves and coconut water.

4.plot: Super fun and easy way to share refreshing margaritas for your friends. Watermelon Lime Margaritas Chilled and Refreshing.

5.plot: AwesomeSauce brings you top 3 delicious and creamy milkshake recipes, easy to make at home with simple and easily available ingredients.

6.plot: 'Coco Tini' as we bet, this chocolaty delight is not only going to impress the chocoholics out there but will also make them crave for more.

7.plot: Mango + Tea + Lemonade = An epic mocktail. This #SummerSpecial mocktail is cleary the beat-the-summer champion.

8.title: Strawberry Mango Smoothie
8.plot: Simple yummy and tasty Strawberry Mango Smoothie to quench your thirst.

1.title: Clip: Bhutta Bites
1.plot: Garma garam bhutta rubbed with butter, salt and lemon. When this is still not enough for your corn craving, Bhutta is not just bites but a wholesome more.

2.title: Clip: Bombay Chapati Sandwich
2.plot: When the packet of bread is missing from the kitchen and you have some left over chapatis from the previous meal, then worry not. Bombay Chapati sandwich is your saviour.

3.title: Clip: Chocolate Shahi Tukda
3.plot: People with a sweet tooth get ready for some royal treat with a twist of chocolate in a classic favourite Shahi Tukda.

4.title: Clip: Dabeli
4.plot: A spicy, crunchy and lip smacking snack- Street Style Dabeli. which you can make in no time.So, put your hands together to make yourself one and bite into the crunch of sev, onions, pomegranate and buttery tosted pav with a super flavourful potato filling.

5.title: Clip: Desi Monaco Bites
5.plot: Let's celebrate the desi flavours of India during this harvest season. Meet Oye, Fatafati, Aaila and Aiyyo Monaco. from India's North, East, West, South and greet all Indians a Happy Lohri, Bihu, Pongal and Makar Sankranti.

6.title: Clip: Mix Dal Pakoda
6.plot: Sometimes all you need is simple. So here's some mixed dal pakodas as little bundles of joy.

7.title: Clip: Nutella Halwa
7.plot: We can never be done with Nutella. Nutella love is back, but this time in halwa.

8.title: Clip: Papad Bhel
8.plot: Crispy strips of Papad tossed with all the chatpata Bhel ingredients gives you a munchy snack. It's same same but different.

9.title: Clip: Vermicelli Pulav
9.plot: Who says Pulav can only be made of rice? A little change in the ingredients is all about having fun. So here's vermicelli pulav to surprise your taste buds.

10.title: Clip: Masala Uttapam
10.plot: South Indian Uttapam with a North Indian Paneer Masala...with so much of diversity, why not make use of it.

1.title: Clip: Achari French Toast
1.plot: You must have tried the sweet and simple French toast. It's time to spice it up a little with some achari flavours...Just pick any pickle to tickle your tastebuds with Achari French Toast.

2.title: Clip: Bread Samosa
2.plot: When you crave for homemade samosas but are too lazy for the long process...simply grab those extra packets of unused bread and instantly fold them into Bread Samosa.

3.title: Clip: Bombay Style Keema Pav
3.plot: Inspired from the age old Irani cafes...here's Bombay Style Keema Pav filled with soya, paneer and all the right spices. which can be enjoyed by both vegetarians and non- vegetarians.

4.title: Clip: Idli Chilli Dry
4.plot: If you are in the mood to try out something new just like us, then do try some Idli Chilli Dry.

5.title: Clip: Masala Prawns Sticks
5.plot: Add some Bengali spice love to your prawns - Marinate, Skew and Sizzle. That's it..it's that quick and easy.

6.title: Clip: Hajmola Pani Puri
6.plot: You may call them Golgappa,Puchka, Gupchup or Pani Puri...but the love for them can never end. Here's our take on Pani Puri with the unique tangy taste of Hajmola.

7.title: Clip: Dahi Vada Shots
7.plot: Loved by one all all- Dahi Vada Shots. A snack which is quick to eat, easy to digest, and a favourite fun party pick. Go give it a shot.

8.title: Clip: Little Hearts Sandesh
8.plot: Let's welcome the love month February with these little hearts sandesh because love is in the air.

1.title: Clip: Candy Crush Kulfi
1.plot: Do you have a crush on someone? If not then crush some candies of your choice and treat yourself to Candy Crush Kulfi.

2.title: Clip: Molten Lava Cake
2.plot: Today,on Valentine's eve.. our hearts are melting with this molten lava cake.

3.title: Clip: Kurkure Aloo Chaat
3.plot: This love season...thin and crispy Kurkure paired up with fuller and soft Aloo to make a spicy and tangy couple.

4.title: Clip: Chana Jor Garam
4.plot: Today, if you are out in the streets then have this but if you are at home then make this....Chana Jor Garam..Our ultimate street style munchy.

5.title: Clip: Mix Veg Lollipop
5.plot: Pep up your Sunday with any vegetables of your choice and turn them into Mixed Veg Lollipops. We used whatever was available in our fridge.

6.title: Clip: Coconut Pudding
6.plot: After sipping into some fresh coconut water, what remains? Malai. Don't waste it, make Coconut Pudding with it.

7.title: Clip: Bun Maska Chaska
7.plot: Bun,butter, cheese and jam. These are the must-have's when hunger pangs. Sometime all you need is as simple as bun maska chaska.

8.title: Clip: Rusk Open Sandwiches
8.plot: It's time to try out some open sandwiches with one of the most popular tea time biscuit- rusk. by using one of our favourite ways of eating, which is just 'mixing and matching'.

2.title: Clip: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
2.plot: What are you having for tomorrow's breakfast? Bread, eggs, milk and cheese...Here's a time saving all in one Egg and Cheese Sandwich.

3.title: Clip: Kachori Chaat
3.plot: This tongue twister or kachori chaat a crunchy twister of flavours in your tongue.

4.title: Clip: Cheesy Onion Bhajiya
4.plot: It's time to get all cheesy with the love for bhajiyas.

5.title: Clip: Achari Heart Chapati
5.plot: An Indian Love Story-Once upon a time when Paratha met Achaar.Their vichaar changed to pyaar.

6.title: Clip: Mumbai Misal Pav
6.plot: Let's March ahead in 2017 with one of the 'pav'pular...oops popular breakfast choices of the Mumbaikars...Misal Pav.

7.title: Clip: Stuffed Egg Roast
7.plot: It's stuffed and then roasted - Need we say anything more ? It's just freakin' awesome.

8.title: Clip: Paneer Chaat
8.plot: Our awesome foodie colleague Tanaya makes this Paneer Chaat and helps us kick start our recipe ideation.

1.title: Clip: Berry Pulao
1.plot: Join us to celebrate Parsi new year with our version of an extremely popular Parsi recipe Berry Pulao . Navroz mubarak.

2.title: Clip: Bread Gulab Jamun
2.plot: Bread ka sandwich,pakoda, pizza, samosa,toast etc are all tried and 'tasted' but Bread ke Gulab Jamun is here to give you a sweet surprise.

3.title: Clip: Party Mini Dosa
3.plot: Get ready to stack up mini dosas for your summer house parties, topped with all time favourite coconut chutney and fried curry leaves.

4.title: Clip: Sweet Poli
4.plot: A Sweet Poli to make your festival sweeter and your family time the sweetest.

5.title: Clip: Sev Aloo Cups
5.plot: Boil. Scoop. Sear. Crisp. That's how you go for it. Save some of your evening appetite for some Sev Aloo cups.

6.title: Clip: No Bake Suji Cake
6.plot: You don't need to be of a certain age to enjoy cake. And who says no bake is no cake?

7.title: Clip: Cheesy Kadak Chapati
7.plot: Those extra left over chapatis just got kadak and cheesy. The ones that were left will now be over.

8.title: Clip: Kala Khatta 3 Ways
8.plot: This April choose your own style of Kala Khatta- Milkshake, Popsicle or Jelly and just beat the heat with your Kala Chashma.

1.title: Clip: Shahi Paneer Skewers
1.plot: One ingredient that will never disspoint you is paneer , no matter what you make it will turn yum , we are going Shahi today.

2.title: Clip: Tandoori Paneer Samosa
2.plot: When the crunchy crust of your favourite evening snack, Samosa is filled with a good amount of spicy Tandoori Paneer...it's nothing but an explosion of desi flavours.

3.title: Clip: Sabudana Cheesy Vada
3.plot: The boring Sabudana vada gets a spicy kick and a cheesy filling which makes it irresistibly interesting.

4.title: Clip: Desi Chicken Lollipop
4.plot: This summer go chicken lollipop with all desi spices.

5.title: Clip: Rice Payasam
5.plot: Start your week with Rice Payasam along with Saffron caramel sauce.

6.title: Clip: Popsicles
6.plot: Don't melt in summers rather melt some tangy, chocolaty and minty flavours in your mouth with Popsicle 3 ways. 3 kinds for 3 days of the long weekend.

7.title: Clip: Lassi
7.plot: We don't know what you drank last summer. But this summer to beat the heat you should try a lot of lassi..

8.title: Clip: Quick Mango Chutney
8.plot: This mango season is incomplete without this khatta meetha and theeka, quick homemade mango chutney with puris.

1.title: Clip: Dahi Puri
1.plot: Dahi hi sahi hai for the summers. Just add the khatta, meetha, teekha flavours in the sukha puris along with dahi and pop them in your mouth.

2.title: Clip: Egg Cups 3 Ways
2.plot: An egg a day keeps your boredom away. Keep your Monday blues at bay with Egg Cups 3 Ways.

3.title: Clip: Dahi Ka Cheela
3.plot: Sometimes the most simplest things are the most beautiful ones. And if they are quick they are even better.

5.title: Clip: Paneer Matar Tikki
5.plot: Call it Paneer Matar or Matar Paneer Tikki....these delicious tikkis will melt in your mouth.

6.title: Clip: Khandvi
6.plot: All the snackers in the house, get your hands rolling for some Khandvi, which is not only light but handy.

7.title: Clip: Matar Kachori
7.plot: Some hot and spicy filling inside a kachori will make you go all 'Matar' gashti during snack time.

8.title: Clip: Namak Pare Chaat
8.plot: When it comes to evening snack, how can Namak Pare be left behind...try out this chaat with Namak Pare and make your snacktime fun.

1.title: Clip: Crispy Schezwan Bread Cubes
1.plot: Add some Chinese tadka in your regular bread and make spicy Schezwan Bread Cubes for Sunday snack time.

2.title: Clip: Indori Style Poha
2.plot: When you have Poha along with onions, sev and Jalebi...you know that it's gotta be from Indore.

3.title: Clip: Veg Tikka Platter
3.plot: Instead of getting grilled in this heat, why not grill these veggies with these amazing combinations.

4.title: Clip: Summer Salads 3 Ways
4.plot: Toss some fresh veggies along with some refreshing dressing to make three different summer salads for the long weekend.

5.title: Clip: Baileys Kulhad
5.plot: When you can have Baileys on the rocks why not try in a kulhad.

6.title: Clip: Sugarcane Mojito
6.plot: After sipping in this refreshing summer cooler, Sugarcane Mojito...your heart will go 'Ganna Mereya.

7.title: Clip: Solkadi Shots
7.plot: Anyone for some solkadi shots this weekend? Not only will these quench your thirst but also be your 'sol'mate for summers.

8.title: Clip: Aam Panna Cocktail
8.plot: Mix some aam for some not so 'aam' cocktail. Stir up some childhood memories of Aam Panna and spike it with some masti.

imdb.title: Clip: Quick Bites
plot: Awesome Sauce Quick Bites brings you crunch and comfort served hot. These lip smacking recipes will perfectly compliment your hot cuppa which even the rain gods wont be able to resist.
